title: Epic Mickey Awesome Edition
description: Explore the Wonders of Albequerque, New Mexico & Save the world from Donald Trump
author: FungusNitrogen

title: Epic Mickey but Basic Fonts
description: Exactly what the name implies. Replaces the fonts of Epic Mickey with Arial and New Times Roman
author: Memer

title: BNK Test (Telephone)
description: First mod to ever mod BNK files... I think
author: Memer

title: Scrapper Mickey Skin
description: Changes Mickey's texture to Scrapper Mickey which is seen in earlier builds of the game
author: SlayCap

title: Hero Mickey Skin
description: Changes Mickey's texture to Hero Mickey which is seen in earlier builds of the game
author: SlayCap

title: Green Mod EM2
description: Changes most of the NPC's to Green! (also changes textures to em2 versions of gremlin textures)
author: SlayCap

title: Green Mod
description: Changes most of the NPC's to Green!
author: SlayCap

title: Beta Brush
description: Changes Mickey's brush texture to the Beta Brush seen in earlier versions of the game
author: SlayCap

title: Beta Icons
description: Changes UI Icons to earlier versions of them
author: SlayCap

title: XBOX Buttons and Controller config
description: XBOX Controller Textures & A custom controller config for Dolphin
author: FoxeeTheBoss

title: PS4 Buttons and Controller config
description: PS4 Controller Textures & A custom controller config for Dolphin
author: FoxeeTheBoss

title: Beta Dialog Box
description: Replaces the dialog box with the one seen in earlier versions of the game
author: SlayCap
